questions.question: Is there some aspect of celebrity that it's isolating that can make you feel really lonely?
Do you think it ever comes back in some small form as a 20 minute podcast or something like that?
And I think they're going to start to have questions about what are the ethics of that?
Is that just part of the creative process, being a creative human in this world?
There are things that happen during an experience of shooting something that you could take or leave, right?
Was it the meaning of life wasn't, didn't they explain it at the end of meaning of life?
